title: Order 2020 (S.I. No. 373 of 2020)), with the consent of the Minister for Public
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Special Tidal Waters (Special Local
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Special Tidal Waters (Special Local 

Licences) (Alteration of Duties) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited special tidal water (special local licences) (alteration duties) order 2021

title: Order 2020 (S.I. No. 373 of 2020)), with the consent of the Minister for Public
heading: 2. This Order comes into operation on 1 January 2022 and has effect as
text_raw:
2. This Order comes into operation on 1 January 2022 and has effect as 
respects licences issued or renewed for a period commencing on or after that 
day.
text_norm: 2 order come operation 1 january 2022 effect respect licence issued renewed period commencing day

title: Order 2020 (S.I. No. 373 of 2020)), with the consent of the Minister for Public
heading: 3. The River Erne (Special Local Licences) Order 1934 (S.R. & O. No. 178
text_raw:
3. The River Erne (Special Local Licences) Order 1934 (S.R. & O. No. 178 

of 1934) is amended by substituting for Article 4 the following: 

“4. (1) The licence duty to be paid in respect of every special local 

licence to use a draft net granted under this Order is €398. 

(2) The licence duty to be paid in respect of every special local 
licence to fish for salmon with a single rod and line granted under this 
Order is €26.”.
text_norm: 3 river erne (special local licences) order 1934 (s.r o no 178 1934) amended substituting article 4 following 4 (1) licence duty paid respect every special local licence use draft net granted order eur398 (2) licence duty paid respect every special local licence fish salmon single rod line granted order eur26

title: Order 2020 (S.I. No. 373 of 2020)), with the consent of the Minister for Public
heading: 4. The River Owenea and Owentocker (Special Local Licences) Order 1935
text_raw:
4. The River Owenea and Owentocker (Special Local Licences) Order 1935 
(S.R. & O. No. 39 of 1935) is amended by substituting for Article 4 the 
following: 

“4. The licence duty to be paid in respect of every special local 

licence to use a draft net granted under this Order is €545.”.
text_norm: 4 river owenea owentocker (special local licences) order 1935 (s.r o no 39 1935) amended substituting article 4 following 4 licence duty paid respect every special local licence use draft net granted order eur545

title: Order 2020 (S.I. No. 373 of 2020)), with the consent of the Minister for Public
heading: 5. The River Lackagh (Special Local Licences) Order 1943 (S.R. & O. No.
text_raw:
5. The River Lackagh (Special Local Licences) Order 1943 (S.R. & O. No. 

15 of 1943) is amended by substituting for Article 4 the following: 

“4. (1) The licence duty to be paid in respect of every special local 

licence to use a draft net granted under this Order is €545. 

(2) The licence duty to be paid in respect of every special local 
licence to fish for salmon with a single rod and line granted under this 
Order is €26.”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 31st December, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [733] 3

title: Order 2020 (S.I. No. 373 of 2020)), with the consent of the Minister for Public
heading: 6. The Rivers Owenmore and Owenduff (Special Local Licences) Order
text_raw:
6. The Rivers Owenmore and Owenduff (Special Local Licences) Order 
1967 (S.I. No. 34 of 1967) is amended by substituting for Article 3 the following: 

“3. (1) The licence duty to be paid in respect of every special local 

licence to use a draft net granted under this Order is €545. 

(2) 

The licence duty to be paid in respect of every special 
local licence to fish for salmon with a single rod and line granted under 
this Order is €26.”. 

The Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform consents to the making of the 
foregoing Order. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Public 
Expenditure and Reform, 
14 December, 2021. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 

Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

17 December 2021. 

EAMON RYAN 

Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [733]

title: Order 2020 (S.I. No. 373 of 2020)), with the consent of the Minister for Public
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

This Order prescribes the licence fees to be payable from 1 January 2022 in 
respect of special local salmon fishing licences, including a salmon conservation 
levy equivalent to 50% of the licence fee. The proceeds of this levy will be 
invested in wild salmon management initiatives designed to rehabilitate wild 
salmon stocks and habitats. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [733] 5
